description: Disguised as a nurse in the school`s hospital, Mako Yakumaru is a member of ANTI-THESIS first sent to assassinate Kusabi Midou after he fails to kill Tsukune. In order to sow dissesion among Tsukune and his friends, Mako controls and manipulates Yukari`s body after injecting her with a hypnotic fluid, forcing her to try to kill him. When this tactic fails, Mako injects her fluid into a multitude of bystanders, all forced to attack Tsukune. She appears in the second season of the anime and designated as the actual school nurse, rather than in disguise as one.
name: Yakumaru Mako
